short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Force Enable Right Click & Copy. Please keep the app updated to get new features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Please keep the app updated to get new features.


* Version 0.0.1: Force Enable Right Click & Copy.
We help you re-enable and allow right click function on every websites that block the right-click menu.

+ Enable Right Click context menu on any website.
+ Remove Copy Text Protection
